string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Annie is a mage with a simple yet powerful kit. She can stun enemies with her passive, and her ultimate, "Summon: Tibbers," releases a giant bear that deals area damage.
Aurelion Sol is a cosmic dragon mage who deals sustained area damage with his stars. He can fly across the map and control space with his abilities.
Garen is a durable melee fighter known for his tankiness and high damage output. His passive, "Perseverance," allows him to regenerate health out of combat.
Akali is an agile assassin who excels at quickly eliminating single targets. She can dash around the battlefield, becoming invisible and dealing high burst damage with her abilities.
Kai\'Sa is a versatile marksman who can evolve her abilities based on the type of damage she deals. She can go for either a traditional AD build or an AP build.
Master Yi is a melee assassin who excels at dealing massive damage in a short amount of time. His ultimate, "Highlander," resets his abilities on takedowns, allowing for chain kills.
Senna is a ranged support marksman. She can deal damage while providing healing and crowd control for her team. Her passive, "Absolution," grants her bonus range and damage.
Teemo is a yordle champion known for his versatility. He can control the map with his mushrooms and harass enemies with his poison attacks.
Yasuo is a melee fighter with high mobility and damage output. His wind wall can block projectiles, and he excels in close combat situations.
Yuumi is a support champion who attaches herself to an ally, providing them with healing, protection, and bonus abilities. She can\'t move on her own but can jump between teammates.
Zoe is a burst mage with a playful and mischievous playstyle. She can pick up summoner spells and use them to her advantage, making her unpredictable in fights.
